00047 #ifndef MT_VECTOR4_H
00048 #define MT_VECTOR4_H
00049 
00050 #include <MT_assert.h>
00051 
00052 #include "MT_Tuple4.h"
00053 
00054 class MT_Vector4 : public MT_Tuple4 {
00055 public:
00056     virtual ~MT_Vector4() {}
00057     MT_Vector4() {}
00058     MT_Vector4(const float *v) : MT_Tuple4(v) {}
00059     MT_Vector4(const double *v) : MT_Tuple4(v) {}
00060     MT_Vector4(MT_Scalar xx, MT_Scalar yy, MT_Scalar zz, MT_Scalar ww) : 
00061         MT_Tuple4(xx, yy, zz, ww) {}
00062   
00063     MT_Vector4& operator+=(const MT_Vector4& v);
00064     MT_Vector4& operator-=(const MT_Vector4& v);
00065     MT_Vector4& operator*=(MT_Scalar s);
00066     MT_Vector4& operator/=(MT_Scalar s);
00067 
00068     MT_Scalar   dot(const MT_Vector4& v) const; 
00069 
00070     MT_Scalar   length2() const;
00071     MT_Scalar   length() const;
00072 
00073     MT_Vector4  absolute() const;
00074 
00075     void        normalize();
00076     MT_Vector4  normalized() const;
00077 
00078     void        scale(MT_Scalar x, MT_Scalar y, MT_Scalar z, MT_Scalar w); 
00079     MT_Vector4  scaled(MT_Scalar x, MT_Scalar y, MT_Scalar z, MT_Scalar w) const; 
00080 
00081     bool        fuzzyZero() const;
00082 };
